MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00am to replace a faulty underground cable on the M74 motorway and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.59am on the 15th of April 2021.
